front.title: Surface Defense Cannon
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy on your starfighter, free on Falcon. May target a character or creature at same site using 1 Force. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny +1 > defense value.
front.lore: BlasTech Ax-108 'Ground Buzzer' blaster cannon. Designed to drop from a concealed gun pod on a starship. Targets using proximity motion sensors. Has 360-degree firing arc.

pulledBy: Lieutenant s'Too cVees (when at a docking bay)
